item.title: Two arrests after baby killed in XL bully dog attack
item.description: The nine-month-old baby boy died at the scene in south-east Wales on Sunday evening.

item.title: ITV in talks to sell television business to Sky
item.description: The talks focus on ITV's free-to-air channels as well as its streaming service, ITV X.

item.title: Bellingham and Foden recalled to England squad
item.description: Thomas Tuchel also hands a first call-up to Bournemouth midfielder Alex Scott, with England having already qualified for the World Cup.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 6 delayed again until November 2026
item.description: The most anticipated video game of all time receives a second official delay from makers Rockstar Games.

item.title: 'Arsenal attack like the 'Invincibles' and defend like class of 97-98'
item.description: They have won nothing yet, but this Arsenal side reminds me of the ones I won three league titles with, writes Martin Keown.
